# Download

There are a variety of tutorials available in a number of formats:

- Simulation testing [html](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gloIjSn4Fd73_MqfuYJdoYZNMDtixw0356ETOZsFpco/edit?usp=sharing) [pdf](http://www.flr-project.org/doc/pdf/ggplotFL_plotting_FLR_objects_with_ggplot2.pdf) [R script](http://www.flr-project.org/doc/R/ggplotFL_plotting_FLR_objects_with_ggplot2.R)
- Management Strategy Evaluation [html](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gloIjSn4Fd73_MqfuYJdoYZNMDtixw0356ETOZsFpco/edit?usp=sharing) [pdf](http://www.flr-project.org/doc/pdf/ggplotFL_plotting_FLR_objects_with_ggplot2.pdf) [R script](http://www.flr-project.org/doc/R/ggplotFL_plotting_FLR_objects_with_ggplot2.R)
